name: Records

methods.name: getMotif
methods.signature: public static ConnectApi.Motif getMotif(String communityId, String idOrPrefix)
methods.description: Get a motif that contains the URLs for a set of small, medium, and large motif icons for a record. It can also contain a base color for the record.

params.name: idOrPrefix
params.description: Use either the ID for a community, internal, or null. An ID or key prefix.

methods.signature: public static ConnectApi.BatchResult[] getMotifBatch(String communityId, List<String> idOrPrefixList)
methods.description: Get a motif for a list of objects.

params.name: idOrPrefixList
params.description: Use either the ID for a community, internal, or null. A list of object IDs or prefixes.

description: Access information about record motifs, which are small icons used to distinguish record types in the Salesforce UI.
